application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of materials and finishes for all external surfaces part pursuant to condition 3 (part discharge - in relation only to pre-cast concrete Block A, B, C) of planning permission 223203FUL dated 09/02/2023 for: Construction of three  buildings, ranging in height from 4 to 20 storeys, to provide 188 mixed tenure residential units (Use Class C3) and ground floor community space (Use Class F2(b)); construction of a new one-way access road, new undercroft car park and landscaped podium to the car park; other landscape and public realm works; surface parking to accommodate existing car parking and blue badge parking and all other associated infrastructure works. (Regulation 3 Application by London Borough of Ealing)
